title: Daniel Smith, 90, Dies; Thought to Be the Last Child of an Enslaved Person
description: He led a life marked by encounters with touchstone moments in Black history, from the March on Washington to Barack Obamaâ€™s first inauguration.
dc:creator: Clay Risen
media:credit: Christopher Gregory for The New York Times
media:description: Daniel Smith in 2013. He liked to say that he had led a quiet, unexciting life, yet he participated in some of the most central moments of Black American history.
